references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced NeRF, a foundational technique for 3D representation in the field of 3D reconstruction, enabling 3D optimization with only 2D supervision.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which are essential to the significant advance of 3D generation with 2D diffusion priors.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduced 3D Gaussian splatting, which is favored in both training and rendering efficiency in 3D generation.

references.paper_title: Learning deformable tetrahedral meshes for 3d reconstruction
references.reason: This paper introduced the deformable tetrahedral grid, which is the geometric primitive for the proposed representation in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Instant neural graphics primitives with a multiresolution hash encoding
references.reason: This paper introduced Instant neural graphics primitives, which is used for rapid geometry convergence in the two-stage 3D generation pipeline.
